title: I was demoted to b5? from b4? even though i won?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: I literally, won the game carried my game from a 4 v 5 and had 0 lp but i was still demoted? Can i ask why? It seems like a rather stupid problem? I mean i literally won. So i don't get why i was demoted still ? Can someone please try to help me out here? {{champion:77}}

replies.body: My last game? That was a ARAM? why would i be demoted for a aram? Okay well thanks man i was justa  bit confused
Pretty sure he meant your last ranked game

so it took a few hours to pop the message. legit rito logic. 
I swear they wont admit they messed up

> [{quoted}](name=Laisenberg,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=V0Jk8bXg,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-03-29T03:44:45.001+0000)
>
> so it took a few hours to pop the message. legit rito logic. 
> I swear they wont admit they messed up

"the message was delayed as a result of an issue earlier today"

that's as explained as it can get. what more can they 'admit'?
As someone else pointed out, I should clarify that by "last game" I meant your last ranked game (which was a few hours earlier). Sorry about the confusion!

From what I see, it looks like the demotion was for the game before this one, but the message was delayed as a result of an issue earlier today which caused match histories to be delayed.

Other than that, everything seems to be normal. You did gain LP for your last game as well (just in case that was a concern) and it looks like you're pretty close to promos again, so good luck in advance!

> [{quoted}](name=RiotBok,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=V0Jk8bXg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-26T03:10:34.887+0000)
>
> From what I see, it looks like the demotion was for the game before this one, but the message was delayed as a result of an issue earlier today which caused match histories to be delayed.
> 
> Other than that, everything seems to be normal. You did gain LP for your last game as well (just in case that was a concern) and it looks like you're pretty close to promos again, so good luck in advance!

He is right though, his previous game was a ARAM game, with a long streak of ARAM games before it. So it does seem to appear (at least) that he managed to get demoted from a win.

Not sure if this will help but you can always try putting in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), that will definitely get you further than posting on here I would assume.
